/circle6 Advise her to go for an institutional delivery.
/circle6 Inform her family members to take her urgently to the PHC/FRU if there are danger 
signs such as:
   /circle6 Headache (increasing in frequency and duration)
  /circle6 Visual disturbances (blurring, double vision, blindness) 
  /circle6 Oliguria (passing less than 400 ml urine in 24 hours)
  /circle6 Upper abdominal pain
